roleset.name: applaud/give accolades to

example.name: recognize-v: almost all args
example.text: I was pleased to note that your Oct. 23 Centennial Journal item recognized the money - fund concept as one of the significant events of the past century .

propbank.arg: as one of the significant events of the past century

example.name: ARG1
example.text: If small innovations are not recognized , or do not get appropriate market rewards , this will destroy the motivation to innovate at all .

example.name: recognition-n: adj arg0
example.text: He gained national recognition as a segregationist .

example.name: recognition-n: MNR and oblique arg0
example.text: Meanwhile , in the South Pacific , there were gains and losses , with the ROC losing its formal ties with Tonga but gaining formal recognition from the Marshall Islands .

example.name: recognition-n: arg2
example.text: If anything it is his friends who are happiest , relieved to see Hsia gaining deserved recognition for the achievements of his peripatetic , ill - starred life .

propbank.arg: for the achievements of his peripatetic , ill - starred life

example.name: recognition-n: arg1
example.text: She holds regular seminars for new immigrants , and was recently awarded the Queen 's Service Medal in recognition of her dedication

example.name: recognition-n: most args
example.text: Being an ardent fan of football , this is my small recognition of them for winning the last three consecutive National Football League .

propbank.arg: for winning the last three consecutive National Football League

example.name: recognition-n: recognition as-- arg3
example.text: His enthusiastic teaching of freshman seminars also led to his recognition as the " Kappa Kappa Gamma Professor of the Year , 2009 . "

propbank.arg: as the " Kappa Kappa Gamma Professor of the Year , 2009 . "

roleset.note: RECOGNIZE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls consider-29.9-1-1, conjecture-29.5-1. Updated by Julia, 2/2011. (from recognize.01-v)
RECOGNITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on recognize-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls judgement-33. (from recognition.01-n)
predication and cause each given their own arg here. (from recognition.01-n)

roleset.name: acknowledge as true/familiar

example.name: recognize-v: the public good
example.text: Decisions by the Second Circuit itself , Judge Oakes continued , had recognized that public interest in the subject matter and the in dispensability in particular cases of verbatim quotations are vital components of fair use .

propbank.arg: Decisions by the Second Circuit itself
that public interest in the subject matter and the in dispensability in particular cases of verbatim quotations are vital components of fair use

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: and I did n't recognize it as her

example.name: recognize-v: acknowledge as true
example.text: In the least , we must recognize the futility of trying to use exchange - rate intervention to offset the effects of tax - rate reduction on capital flows .

propbank.arg: the futility of trying to use exchange - rate intervention to offset the effects of tax - rate reduction on capital flows

example.name: recognition-n: arg1
example.text: He should do more to reduce tax rates on wealth and income , in recognition of the fact that those cuts yield higher , not lower , revenues .

propbank.arg: of the fact that those cuts yield higher , not lower , revenues

example.name: recognition-n: another arg1
example.text: a recognition that there was much too much fluff in the LBO market

propbank.arg: that there was much too much fluff in the LBO market

example.name: recognition-n: internal arg1
example.text: but when you link this simple product together with a trademark , powerful name recognition , and high quality control , the result has swept the globe .

example.name: recognition-n: both args
example.text: ... the Standing Committee of the 8th NPC formally passed the " Laws of the PRC Red Cross Society " , reflecting the state 's high - level recognition and support of the humanitarian cause of the Red Cross .

propbank.arg: of the humanitarian cause of the Red Cross

roleset.note: RECOGNIZE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls conjecture-29.5-1, sight-30.2, consider-29.9-1-1. (from recognize.02-v)
RECOGNITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on recognize-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls conjecture-29.5-1, sight-30.2, consider-29.9-1-1. (from recognition.02-n)

roleset.name: able to be identified

example.name: recognizable-j
example.text: Sediment deposited by turbidity currents are called turbidites and are geologically unique and recognizable by their layering -LRB- graded bedding and Bouma Sequences -RRB- .

propbank.arg: by their layering -LRB- graded bedding and Bouma Sequences -RRB-

roleset.note: RECOGNIZABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.
